name: Kuni Color
description:
Kuni Color is a video game which takes inspiration from the latin american cosmo vision. Kuni is the deity who protects the world around us, and who is looking to vanish the Alinkas (evil spirits) that have dispersed around the planet and infected it (as a metaphor for the fight between virus and vaccine)

Kuni Color is a game that aims to encourage the player to experiment with their drawing and painting skills, as a way of relaxing while we are requested to stay indoors due to the pandemic quarantine.

The mechanics of the game centers on moving Kuni around the planet like a brush over canvas. Kuni will absorb colors as he touches and vanishes the evil creatures, adding a new color to its palet, thus giving new life and color to the planet.
